mapper.insert: insert into abdominal_us_result( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, exam_no, exam_name, tumor, recrudescence, transfer, transfer_site, ascites, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{examNo}, #{examName}, #{tumor}, #{recrudescence}, #{transfer}, #{transferSite}, #{ascites}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update abdominal_us_result set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, exam_no = #{examNo}, exam_name = #{examName}, tumor = #{tumor}, recrudescence = #{recrudescence}, transfer = #{transfer}, transfer_site = #{transferSite}, ascites = #{ascites}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
